pages.text: Druids use all kinds of herbs that they need for rituals and spells. The first herbs you will need can be retrieved by breaking grass. Some need to be grown on other blocks and others need to be crafted with a ritual. Some herbs act as their own seed, others need to be crafted into a seed.

pages.title: Terra Moss
pages.text: Terra moss can be obtained by using terra spores on cobble stone that is sitting next to water and then using the runic shears to obtain the terra moss. You can also use runic shears on naturally found mossy cobblestone to retrieve Terra Moss
